remark.p: Deputy Political Adviser to the Commander in Chief, Pacific, after September 1959; Regional Coordinator for the Far East, Office of Coordinator for Mutual Security, Department of State, from September 1960

Regional Coordinator for Far East, Office of Coordination for Mutual Security Affairs, Department of State, until October 1961; SEATO Affairs Officer, Bureau of Far Eastern Affairs, until May 1962; political-military affairs officer, Bureau of Far Eastern Affairs, until July 1963
